p:
Considering the 74 annotated MRPGs, 16 were DEGs in at least one of the treatments using acetic acid (Supplemental Table S 1). All these genes are upregulated at 45 min. Whereas, 5 genes (all upregulated) are DEGs after 120 min (Supplemental Table S 1). In particular, among the genes upregulated at 45 min, RSM23 (YGL129C) is known to be involved in yeast programmed cell death
36 .
